content.rendered:
24Fashion TV Exclusive: Glaudi kicked off day two with an elegant collection of evening-wear for men and women. Designer presented Haute Couture Luxury bridal collections consisting of luxury satin gowns, pink bridal dresses, two-piece bridal dresses and traditional wedding gowns. Glaudi also presented a mens suit collection for the groom as well as a bridal full white suit. 

About: Glaudi Based in the capital of luxury fashion, Beverly Hills, GLAUDI by Johana Hernandez is a celebrity couture bridal house that creates one-of-a-kind bridal designs, evening gowns, and men's bespoke suits. Johana was nominated as one of the 25 most influential Latinas in People en Espaol and is part of Marquis Who's Who in America. Some memorable moments include becoming the first Salvadoran to present at Paris Fashion Weekand being the first Latinx on the cover of the Beverly Hills Courier since 1965. Designer: Johana Hernandez

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Jeff McDonald exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
